title: Create basic admin dashboard structure

requirements.text: Create a basic admin dashboard page structure at frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.tsx that displays a welcome message and placeholder sections for future admin features

quotes: just adding the basic admin dashboard structure first

acceptanceCriteria: Page displays a clear admin dashboard title
Page includes placeholder sections or cards for future features (Stripe settings, user management, revenue analytics)
Page is accessible via the existing admin route configuration

requirements.text: Add a backend method to check if a principal ID matches the hardcoded admin principal (gwnln-jmtc7-rdrpt-tzrrg-cygwh-k27i2-hlppl-3v4wb-holfc-ezwwn-3qe) and return a boolean indicating admin status

quotes: Admin Access Control: Lock the admin panel to only your principal ID

acceptanceCriteria: Backend includes a public query method isAdmin() that returns true only for the specified principal ID
Method is callable from the frontend
Non-admin principals receive false when calling this method

requirements.text: Create a React Query hook useIsAdmin in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts that calls the backend isAdmin method and returns the admin status
acceptanceCriteria: Hook successfully fetches admin status from backend
Hook returns a boolean indicating if the current user is an admin
Hook handles loading and error states appropriately

requirements.text: Update the AdminDashboardPage to use the useIsAdmin hook and display an access denied message for non-admin users while showing the dashboard content only for the admin principal

quotes: Lock the admin panel to only your principal ID

acceptanceCriteria: Non-admin users see a clear access denied message when visiting the admin dashboard
The admin principal (gwnln-jmtc7-rdrpt-tzrrg-cygwh-k27i2-hlppl-3v4wb-holfc-ezwwn-3qe) can view the full dashboard
Access control check happens before rendering dashboard content

constraints: Use the existing single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
Do not modify Internet Identity integration hooks
Do not modify UI component library files in frontend/src/components/ui
Keep admin principal ID hardcoded as: gwnln-jmtc7-rdrpt-tzrrg-cygwh-k27i2-hlppl-3v4wb-holfc-ezwwn-3qe
nonGoals: Stripe Connect integration or configuration (will be added in subsequent build)
Complex admin features beyond basic structure
Dynamic admin role assignment or multi-admin support
